# Vishal Agrahari - Senior SEO & Digital Marketing Specialist

## Who is Vishal?
Vishal Agrahari is a Senior SEO & Digital Marketing Specialist with 6+ years of experience helping SaaS and tech brands grow. He specializes in:
- **SEO & Organic Growth**: Technical SEO, Content Strategy, Link Building.
- **Automation**: n8n workflows, AI agents, Zapier.
- **Performance Marketing**: Google Ads, Meta Ads.
- **Tools**: Ahrefs, SEMrush, Looker Studio, Claude, OpenAI, Antigravity.

## Services
1. Digital Marketing & SEO
2. Performance Marketing (Ads)
3. Automation Workflows (n8n/AI)
4. Content Creation & Strategy
5. E-commerce SEO
6. Brand Strategy

## Experience
- **ShoutRank**: SEO Expert & Team Lead (2020 - Present)
- **Renske Technologies**: News Editor (2024 - 2025)
- **World Wire**: Content Editor (2022 - 2023)
